00031 #include <stdio.h>
00032 #include <stdlib.h>
00033 #include <getopt.h>
00034 
00035 #include <liblog.h>
00036 #include <liberror.h>
00037 
00038 #include "kurud.h"
00039 #include "kurud_err.h"

00041 /*============================================================================*/
00042 /* Private declarations                                                       */
00043 /*============================================================================*/

00049 #define KURUD_NAME                      "kurud"
00050 #define KURUD_VERSION           "v0.1"
00051 #define COPYRIGHT                       "Copyright (C) 2006-07"
00052 #define AUTHORS                         "The Kurupira Project " \
00053                                                         "<iamscared[at]users.sourceforge.net>\n"
00054 #define LICENSE                         "GNU General Public License (GPL) 2"
00055 
00060 static struct option options[] = {
00061         {"foreground", no_argument, NULL, 'f'},
00062         {"config", required_argument, NULL, 'c'},
00063         {"help", no_argument, NULL, 'h'},
00064         {"version", no_argument, NULL, 'v'}
00065 };
00066 
00070 #define GETOPT_PARAMETERS               "fc:hv"
00071 
00075 void usage();
00076 
00080 void version();
00081 
00082 /*============================================================================*/
00083 /* Main procedure.                                                            */
00084 /*============================================================================*/
00085 
00086 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00087         char *config_file = NULL;
00088         char ch;
00089         int background = 1;
00090 
00091         while ((ch = getopt_long(argc, argv, GETOPT_PARAMETERS, options,
00092                                                         NULL)) != -1) {
00093                 switch (ch) {
00094                         case 'f':
00095                                 background = 0;
00096                                 break;
00097                         case 'c':
00098                                 config_file = optarg;
00099                                 break;
00100                         case 'v':
00101                                 version();
00102                                 exit(0);
00103                         case '?':
00104                         case 'h':
00105                         default:
00106                                 usage();
00107                                 exit(0);
00108                 }
00109         }
00110 
00111         /* Running in background */
00112         if (background) {
00113                 TRY(daemon(0, 0) == 0, FATAL(REASON_DAEMON_FORK));
00114         }
00115         TRY(kurud_init(config_file), FATAL(REASON_DAEMON_INIT));
00116         TRY(kurud_wait(), FATAL(REASON_DAEMON_RUN));
00117 end:
00118         kurud_finish();
00119         liblog_info(MODULE_DAEMON, "daemon terminated.");
00120         return 0;
00121 }
00122 
00123 /*============================================================================*/
00124 /* Private definitions                                                        */
00125 /*============================================================================*/
00126 
00127 void usage() {
00128         printf("Usage: " KURUD_NAME " [options]\n");
00129         printf("The Kurupira daemon.\n");
00130         printf("\n");
00131         printf("Options:\n");
00132         printf("\n");
00133         printf("-f, --foreground        run daemon in foreground.\n");
00134         printf("-c, --config <file>     define configuration file.\n");
00135         printf("-h, --help              display this help screen.\n");
00136         printf("-v, --version           show version information and exit.\n");
00137 }
00138 
00139 void version() {
00140         printf(" Program: %s %s %s\n", KURUD_NAME, KURUD_VERSION, COPYRIGHT);
00141         printf(" License: %s\n", LICENSE);
00142         printf(" Authors: %s\n", AUTHORS);
00143 }
